Instruction:
You will be given one paragraph in a related work section of scientific paper.

Your task is to write a topic sentence for a given paragraph.

A topic sentence is a sentence that captures the main idea of a paragraph or section of text. The topic sentence is one sentences that introduce a paragraph. The topic sentence should be long ~300 characters.
